input.content:
# Dynamic Routes Configuration
http:
  routers:
    # Main application
    wikidocs-app:
      rule: "Host(`wikidocs.io`) || Host(`www.wikidocs.io`)"
      entryPoints:
        - websecure
      middlewares:
        - security-headers
        - rate-limit
        - compress
      service: wikidocs-app
      tls:
        certResolver: letsencrypt
        options: intermediate

    # API Gateway
    wikidocs-api:
      rule: "Host(`api.wikidocs.io`)"
      entryPoints:
        - websecure
      middlewares:
        - security-headers
        - api-rate-limit
        - cors
        - compress
        - circuit-breaker
      service: wikidocs-api
      tls:
        certResolver: letsencrypt
        options: intermediate

    # Admin panel (Claude Code)
    wikidocs-admin:
      rule: "Host(`admin.wikidocs.io`)"
      entryPoints:
        - websecure
      middlewares:
        - claude-code-auth
        - security-headers
        - ip-whitelist
        - rate-limit
      service: wikidocs-admin
      tls:
        certResolver: letsencrypt
        options: modern

    # Keycloak
    keycloak:
      rule: "Host(`auth.wikidocs.io`)"
      entryPoints:
        - websecure
      middlewares:
        - security-headers
        - rate-limit
      service: keycloak
      tls:
        certResolver: letsencrypt
        options: modern

    # Vault UI
    vault:
      rule: "Host(`vault.wikidocs.io`)"
      entryPoints:
        - websecure
      middlewares:
        - claude-code-auth
        - security-headers
        - ip-whitelist
      service: vault
      tls:
        certResolver: letsencrypt
        options: modern

    # Grafana
    grafana:
      rule: "Host(`metrics.wikidocs.io`)"
      entryPoints:
        - websecure
      middlewares:
        - security-headers
        - rate-limit
      service: grafana
      tls:
        certResolver: letsencrypt
        options: intermediate

    # WebSocket support
    wikidocs-ws:
      rule: "Host(`ws.wikidocs.io`)"
      entryPoints:
        - websecure
      middlewares:
        - security-headers
      service: wikidocs-ws
      tls:
        certResolver: letsencrypt
        options: intermediate

  services:
    # WikiDocs Application
    wikidocs-app:
      loadBalancer:
        servers:
          - url: "http://wikidocs-frontend:3000"
        healthCheck:
          path: /health
          interval: 30s
          timeout: 3s
          scheme: http
        sticky:
          cookie:
            name: wikidocs_session
            secure: true
            httpOnly: true
            sameSite: lax

    # WikiDocs API
    wikidocs-api:
      loadBalancer:
        servers:
          - url: "http://wikidocs-api:8080"
          - url: "http://wikidocs-api-2:8080"
        healthCheck:
          path: /api/health
          interval: 10s
          timeout: 3s
          scheme: http
        sticky:
          cookie:
            name: api_session
            secure: true
            httpOnly: true

    # Admin Service
    wikidocs-admin:
      loadBalancer:
        servers:
          - url: "http://wikidocs-admin:8081"
        healthCheck:
          path: /admin/health
          interval: 30s
          timeout: 3s

    # Keycloak
    keycloak:
      loadBalancer:
        servers:
          - url: "https://keycloak:8443"
        healthCheck:
          path: /health/ready
          interval: 30s
          timeout: 5s
          scheme: https

    # Vault
    vault:
      loadBalancer:
        servers:
          - url: "https://vault:8200"
        healthCheck:
          path: /v1/sys/health
          interval: 30s
          timeout: 5s
          scheme: https

    # Grafana
    grafana:
      loadBalancer:
        servers:
          - url: "http://grafana:3000"
        healthCheck:
          path: /api/health
          interval: 30s
          timeout: 3s

    # WebSocket Service
    wikidocs-ws:
      loadBalancer:
        servers:
          - url: "http://wikidocs-ws:8082"

    # Error pages service
    error-service:
      loadBalancer:
        servers:
          - url: "http://error-pages:8080"

# TLS Configuration
tls:
  options:
    # Modern configuration (A+ rating)
    modern:
      minVersion: VersionTLS13
      sniStrict: true
      alpnProtocols:
        - h2
        - http/1.1
      cipherSuites:
        - TLS_AES_256_GCM_SHA384
        - TLS_CHACHA20_POLY1305_SHA256
        - TLS_AES_128_GCM_SHA256

    # Intermediate configuration (A rating)
    intermediate:
      minVersion: VersionTLS12
      sniStrict: true
      alpnProtocols:
        - h2
        - http/1.1
      cipherSuites:
        - TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_256_GCM_SHA384
        - TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_256_GCM_SHA384
        - TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256
        - TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256
        - TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_CHACHA20_POLY1305_SHA256
        - TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_CHACHA20_POLY1305_SHA256
      curvePreferences:
        - X25519
        - CurveP384
        - CurveP256

  stores:
    default:
      defaultGeneratedCert:
        resolver: letsencrypt
        domain:
          main: wikidocs.io
          sans:
            - "*.wikidocs.io"

        - circuit-breaker
      service: wikidocs-api
      tls:
        certResolver: letsencrypt
        options: intermediate

    # Admin panel (Claude Code)
    wikidocs-admin:
      rule: "Host(`admin.wikidocs.io`)"
      entryPoints:
        - websecure
      middlewares:
        - claude-code-auth
        - security-headers
        - ip-whitelist
        - rate-limit
      service: wikidocs-admin
      tls:
        certResolver: letsencrypt
        options: modern

    # Keycloak
    keycloak:
      rule: "Host(`auth.wikidocs.io`)"
      entryPoints:
        - websecure
      middlewares:
        - security-headers
        - rate-limit
      service: keycloak
      tls:
        certResolver: letsencrypt
        options: modern

    # Vault UI
    vault:
      rule: "Host(`vault.wikidocs.io`)"
      entryPoints:
        - websecure
      middlewares:
        - claude-code-auth
        - security-headers
        - ip-whitelist
      service: vault
      tls:
        certResolver: letsencrypt
        options: modern

    # Grafana
    grafana:
      rule: "Host(`metrics.wikidocs.io`)"
      entryPoints:
        - websecure
      middlewares:
        - security-headers
        - rate-limit
      service: grafana
      tls:
        certResolver: letsencrypt
        options: intermediate

    # WebSocket support
    wikidocs-ws:
      rule: "Host(`ws.wikidocs.io`)"
      entryPoints:
        - websecure
      middlewares:
        - security-headers
      service: wikidocs-ws
      tls:
        certResolver: letsencrypt
        options: intermediate

  services:
    # WikiDocs Application
    wikidocs-app:
      loadBalancer:
        servers:
          - url: "http://wikidocs-frontend:3000"
        healthCheck:
          path: /health
          interval: 30s
          timeout: 3s
          scheme: http
        sticky:
          cookie:
            name: wikidocs_session
            secure: true
            httpOnly: true
            sameSite: lax

    # WikiDocs API
    wikidocs-api:
      loadBalancer:
        servers:
          - url: "http://wikidocs-api:8080"
          - url: "http://wikidocs-api-2:8080"
        healthCheck:
          path: /api/health
          interval: 10s
          timeout: 3s
          scheme: http
        sticky:
          cookie:
            name: api_session
            secure: true
            httpOnly: true

    # Admin Service
    wikidocs-admin:
      loadBalancer:
        servers:
          - url: "http://wikidocs-admin:8081"
        healthCheck:
          path: /admin/health
          interval: 30s
          timeout: 3s

    # Keycloak
    keycloak:
      loadBalancer:
        servers:
          - url: "https://keycloak:8443"
        healthCheck:
          path: /health/ready
          interval: 30s
          timeout: 5s
          scheme: https

    # Vault
    vault:
      loadBalancer:
        servers:
          - url: "https://vault:8200"
        healthCheck:
          path: /v1/sys/health
          interval: 30s
          timeout: 5s
          scheme: https

    # Grafana
    grafana:
      loadBalancer:
        servers:
          - url: "http://grafana:3000"
        healthCheck:
          path: /api/health
          interval: 30s
          timeout: 3s

    # WebSocket Service
    wikidocs-ws:
      loadBalancer:
        servers:
          - url: "http://wikidocs-ws:8082"

    # Error pages service
    error-service:
      loadBalancer:
        servers:
          - url: "http://error-pages:8080"

# TLS Configuration
tls:
  options:
    # Modern configuration (A+ rating)
    modern:
      minVersion: VersionTLS13
      sniStrict: true
      alpnProtocols:
        - h2
        - http/1.1
      cipherSuites:
        - TLS_AES_256_GCM_SHA384
        - TLS_CHACHA20_POLY1305_SHA256
        - TLS_AES_128_GCM_SHA256

    # Intermediate configuration (A rating)
    intermediate:
      minVersion: VersionTLS12
      sniStrict: true
      alpnProtocols:
        - h2
        - http/1.1
      cipherSuites:
        - TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_256_GCM_SHA384
        - TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_256_GCM_SHA384
        - TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256
        - TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256
        - TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_CHACHA20_POLY1305_SHA256
        - TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_CHACHA20_POLY1305_SHA256
      curvePreferences:
        - X25519
        - CurveP384
        - CurveP256

  stores:
    default:
      defaultGeneratedCert:
        resolver: letsencrypt
        domain:
          main: wikidocs.io
          sans:
            - "*.wikidocs.io"

input.content:
version: '3.9'

services:
  # Nomad Server
  nomad-server:
    image: hashicorp/nomad:1.7
    container_name: nomad-server
    command: agent -server -config=/etc/nomad
    cap_add:
      - SYS_ADMIN
      - IPC_LOCK
    volumes:
      - ./config/server:/etc/nomad:ro
      - nomad-data:/opt/nomad/data
      - /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock:ro
    environment:
      NOMAD_DATA_DIR: /opt/nomad/data
      NOMAD_ADDR: https://0.0.0.0:4646
      NOMAD_BIND_ADDR: 0.0.0.0
      NOMAD_ADVERTISE_ADDR: ${NOMAD_ADVERTISE_ADDR:-nomad-server}
      VAULT_ADDR: https://vault:8200
      VAULT_TOKEN: ${VAULT_NOMAD_TOKEN}
      CONSUL_HTTP_ADDR: http://consul:8500
    ports:
      - "4646:4646"  # HTTP API
      - "4647:4647"  # RPC
      - "4648:4648"  # Serf
    networks:
      - nomad-net
      - vault-net
    depends_on:
      - consul
    restart: unless-stopped

  # Nomad Client (Sandbox Executor)
  nomad-client-sandbox:
    image: hashicorp/nomad:1.7
    container_name: nomad-client-sandbox
    command: agent -client -config=/etc/nomad
    privileged: true
    cap_add:
      - ALL
    security_opt:
      - apparmor:unconfined
      - seccomp:unconfined
    volumes:
      - ./config/client:/etc/nomad:ro
      - nomad-client-data:/opt/nomad/data
      - /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock
      - /sys:/sys:ro
      - /proc:/proc:ro
      - sandbox-volumes:/opt/sandbox/volumes
    environment:
      NOMAD_DATA_DIR: /opt/nomad/data
      NOMAD_ADDR: https://nomad-server:4646
      NOMAD_CLIENT_MAX_DISK: "10GB"
      NOMAD_CLIENT_MEMORY: "8GB"
      NOMAD_CLIENT_CPU: "4000"
      VAULT_ADDR: https://vault:8200
      CONSUL_HTTP_ADDR: http://consul:8500
    networks:
      - nomad-net
      - sandbox-net
    depends_on:
      - nomad-server
    restart: unless-stopped

  # Consul for service discovery
  consul:
    image: hashicorp/consul:1.17
    container_name: consul-nomad
    command: agent -server -ui -bootstrap-expect=1 -client=0.0.0.0
    environment:
      CONSUL_BIND_INTERFACE: eth0
      CONSUL_LOCAL_CONFIG: |
        {
          "datacenter": "dc1",
          "data_dir": "/consul/data",
          "log_level": "INFO",
          "server": true,
          "ui_config": {
            "enabled": true
          },
          "connect": {
            "enabled": true
          },
          "acl": {
            "enabled": true,
            "default_policy": "deny"
          }
        }
    volumes:
      - consul-nomad-data:/consul/data
    ports:
      - "8500:8500"
      - "8600:8600/udp"
    networks:
      - nomad-net
      - vault-net
    restart: unless-stopped

  # Firecracker for lightweight VMs (optional)
  firecracker-containerd:
    image: firecracker/firecracker-containerd:latest
    container_name: firecracker
    privileged: true
    cap_add:
      - ALL
    devices:
      - /dev/kvm
      - /dev/net/tun
    volumes:
      - /var/run/firecracker-containerd:/var/run/firecracker-containerd
      - firecracker-images:/var/lib/firecracker-containerd
    networks:
      - sandbox-net
    restart: unless-stopped

  # gVisor for secure container runtime
  gvisor-runsc:
    image: gcr.io/gvisor/runsc:latest
    container_name: gvisor
    privileged: true
    volumes:
      - /var/run/docker/runtime-runc:/var/run/docker/runtime-runc
      - gvisor-state:/var/run/gvisor
    networks:
      - sandbox-net
    restart: unless-stopped

networks:
  nomad-net:
    driver: bridge
  sandbox-net:
    driver: bridge
    internal: true
  vault-net:
    external: true

volumes:
  nomad-data:
  nomad-client-data:
  consul-nomad-data:
  sandbox-volumes:
  firecracker-images:
  gvisor-state:

input.content:
# Nomad Server Configuration
datacenter = "dc1"
data_dir   = "/opt/nomad/data"
log_level  = "INFO"
log_json   = true

# Enable the server
server {
  enabled          = true
  bootstrap_expect = 1
  
  # Encryption
  encrypt = "${NOMAD_ENCRYPT_KEY}"
  
  # Enable all schedulers
  enabled_schedulers = ["service", "batch", "system"]
  
  # Job garbage collection
  job_gc_interval = "5m"
  job_gc_threshold = "4h"
  
  # Evaluation garbage collection
  eval_gc_threshold = "1h"
  
  # Deployment garbage collection
  deployment_gc_threshold = "1h"
  
  # CSI plugin garbage collection
  csi_plugin_gc_threshold = "1h"
  csi_volume_claim_gc_threshold = "1h"
  
  # Node garbage collection
  node_gc_threshold = "24h"
  
  # Raft configuration
  raft_protocol = 3
  raft_multiplier = 1
  
  # Heartbeat configuration
  heartbeat_grace = "30s"
  min_heartbeat_ttl = "10s"
  max_heartbeats_per_second = 50
}

# Advertise addresses
advertise {
  http = "${NOMAD_ADVERTISE_ADDR}:4646"
  rpc  = "${NOMAD_ADVERTISE_ADDR}:4647"
  serf = "${NOMAD_ADVERTISE_ADDR}:4648"
}

# HTTP API configuration
http {
  bind_addr = "0.0.0.0"
  port      = 4646
  
  # Response headers
  response_headers {
    "Access-Control-Allow-Origin"  = "*"
    "Access-Control-Allow-Methods" = "GET, PUT, POST, DELETE, OPTIONS"
    "Access-Control-Allow-Headers" = "Content-Type, X-Nomad-Token"
    "X-Content-Type-Options"       = "nosniff"
    "X-Frame-Options"              = "DENY"
  }
}

# RPC configuration
rpc {
  bind_addr = "0.0.0.0"
  port      = 4647
}

# Serf configuration
serf {
  bind_addr = "0.0.0.0"
  port      = 4648
}

# TLS configuration
tls {
  http = true
  rpc  = true
  
  ca_file   = "/etc/nomad/tls/ca.crt"
  cert_file = "/etc/nomad/tls/server.crt"
  key_file  = "/etc/nomad/tls/server.key"
  
  verify_server_hostname = true
  verify_https_client    = true
}

# ACL configuration
acl {
  enabled    = true
  token_ttl  = "30m"
  policy_ttl = "30m"
  token_min_expiration_ttl = "1m"
  token_max_expiration_ttl = "24h"
}

# Consul integration
consul {
  address              = "${CONSUL_HTTP_ADDR}"
  server_service_name  = "nomad"
  client_service_name  = "nomad-client"
  auto_advertise       = true
  server_auto_join     = true
  client_auto_join     = true
  
  # Service checks
  checks_use_advertise = true
}

# Vault integration
vault {
  enabled          = true
  address          = "${VAULT_ADDR}"
  token            = "${VAULT_TOKEN}"
  create_from_role = "nomad-cluster"
  
  # Certificate renewal
  ca_file   = "/etc/nomad/vault/ca.crt"
  cert_file = "/etc/nomad/vault/client.crt"
  key_file  = "/etc/nomad/vault/client.key"
}

# Telemetry
telemetry {
  publish_allocation_metrics = true
  publish_node_metrics       = true
  prometheus_metrics         = true
  disable_hostname           = false
  collection_interval        = "10s"
}

# Audit logging
audit {
  enabled = true
  
  # Audit sinks
  sink "file" {
    type               = "file"
    format             = "json"
    path               = "/opt/nomad/audit/audit.log"
    delivery_guarantee = "enforced"
    rotate_bytes       = 10485760
    rotate_duration    = "24h"
    rotate_max_files   = 10
  }
}

# Limits configuration
limits {
  http_max_conns_per_client = 100
  rpc_handshake_timeout     = "5s"
  rpc_max_conns_per_client  = 100
}

# Plugin configuration
plugin "docker" {
  config {
    endpoint = "unix:///var/run/docker.sock"
    
    # Security options
    allow_privileged = false
    allow_caps = [
      "CHOWN", "DAC_OVERRIDE", "FSETID", "FOWNER", "MKNOD",
      "NET_RAW", "SETGID", "SETUID", "SETFCAP", "SETPCAP",
      "NET_BIND_SERVICE", "SYS_CHROOT", "KILL", "AUDIT_WRITE"
    ]
    
    # Resource limits
    gc {
      image       = true
      image_delay = "3m"
      container   = true
    }
    
    volumes {
      enabled = true
    }
  }
}

# Plugin for secure sandboxes
plugin "exec" {
  config {
    # Disable raw exec for security
    no_cgroups = false
    
    # Command whitelist
    command_whitelist = [
      "/usr/bin/python3",
      "/usr/bin/node",
      "/usr/bin/deno",
      "/usr/bin/julia"
    ]
  }
}

# Enable raw_exec only for trusted workloads (Claude Code admin)
plugin "raw_exec" {
  config {
    enabled = false  # Disabled by default for security
  }
}

}

# Plugin for secure sandboxes
plugin "exec" {
  config {
    # Disable raw exec for security
    no_cgroups = false
    
    # Command whitelist
    command_whitelist = [
      "/usr/bin/python3",
      "/usr/bin/node",
      "/usr/bin/deno",
      "/usr/bin/julia"
    ]
  }
}

# Enable raw_exec only for trusted workloads (Claude Code admin)
plugin "raw_exec" {
  config {
    enabled = false  # Disabled by default for security
  }
}

input.content:
version: '3.9'

services:
  # Prometheus for metrics collection
  prometheus:
    image: prom/prometheus:latest
    container_name: prometheus
    command:
      - '--config.file=/etc/prometheus/prometheus.yml'
      - '--storage.tsdb.path=/prometheus'
      - '--storage.tsdb.retention.time=30d'
      - '--storage.tsdb.retention.size=10GB'
      - '--web.console.libraries=/usr/share/prometheus/console_libraries'
      - '--web.console.templates=/usr/share/prometheus/consoles'
      - '--web.enable-lifecycle'
      - '--web.enable-admin-api'
    volumes:
      - ./prometheus:/etc/prometheus
      - prometheus-data:/prometheus
    ports:
      - "9090:9090"
    networks:
      - observability-net
    restart: unless-stopped

  # Thanos Sidecar for long-term storage
  thanos-sidecar:
    image: quay.io/thanos/thanos:v0.34.0
    container_name: thanos-sidecar
    command:
      - sidecar
      - --tsdb.path=/prometheus
      - --prometheus.url=http://prometheus:9090
      - --grpc-address=0.0.0.0:10901
      - --http-address=0.0.0.0:10902
      - --objstore.config-file=/etc/thanos/objstore.yml
    volumes:
      - prometheus-data:/prometheus:ro
      - ./thanos/objstore.yml:/etc/thanos/objstore.yml:ro
    ports:
      - "10901:10901"
      - "10902:10902"
    networks:
      - observability-net
    depends_on:
      - prometheus
    restart: unless-stopped

  # Thanos Store Gateway
  thanos-store:
    image: quay.io/thanos/thanos:v0.34.0
    container_name: thanos-store
    command:
      - store
      - --data-dir=/data
      - --grpc-address=0.0.0.0:10903
      - --http-address=0.0.0.0:10904
      - --objstore.config-file=/etc/thanos/objstore.yml
    volumes:
      - thanos-store-data:/data
      - ./thanos/objstore.yml:/etc/thanos/objstore.yml:ro
    ports:
      - "10903:10903"
      - "10904:10904"
    networks:
      - observability-net
    restart: unless-stopped

  # Thanos Query for unified view
  thanos-query:
    image: quay.io/thanos/thanos:v0.34.0
    container_name: thanos-query
    command:
      - query
      - --grpc-address=0.0.0.0:10905
      - --http-address=0.0.0.0:10906
      - --store=thanos-sidecar:10901
      - --store=thanos-store:10903
      - --store=thanos-ruler:10909
      - --query.replica-label=replica
      - --query.auto-downsampling
    ports:
      - "10905:10905"
      - "10906:10906"
    networks:
      - observability-net
    depends_on:
      - thanos-sidecar
      - thanos-store
    restart: unless-stopped

  # Thanos Compactor for data compaction
  thanos-compactor:
    image: quay.io/thanos/thanos:v0.34.0
    container_name: thanos-compactor
    command:
      - compact
      - --data-dir=/data
      - --objstore.config-file=/etc/thanos/objstore.yml
      - --http-address=0.0.0.0:10907
      - --wait
      - --retention.resolution-raw=30d
      - --retention.resolution-5m=90d
      - --retention.resolution-1h=1y
    volumes:
      - thanos-compact-data:/data
      - ./thanos/objstore.yml:/etc/thanos/objstore.yml:ro
    ports:
      - "10907:10907"
    networks:
      - observability-net
    restart: unless-stopped

  # Thanos Ruler for alerting
  thanos-ruler:
    image: quay.io/thanos/thanos:v0.34.0
    container_name: thanos-ruler
    command:
      - rule
      - --data-dir=/data
      - --rule-file=/etc/thanos/rules/*.yml
      - --eval-interval=1m
      - --grpc-address=0.0.0.0:10909
      - --http-address=0.0.0.0:10910
      - --objstore.config-file=/etc/thanos/objstore.yml
      - --query=thanos-query:10906
      - --alertmanagers.url=http://alertmanager:9093
    volumes:
      - thanos-ruler-data:/data
      - ./thanos/objstore.yml:/etc/thanos/objstore.yml:ro
      - ./thanos/rules:/etc/thanos/rules:ro
    ports:
      - "10909:10909"
      - "10910:10910"
    networks:
      - observability-net
    restart: unless-stopped

  # Loki for log aggregation
  loki:
    image: grafana/loki:3.0.0
    container_name: loki
    command: -config.file=/etc/loki/config.yml
    volumes:
      - ./loki/config.yml:/etc/loki/config.yml:ro
      - loki-data:/loki
    ports:
      - "3100:3100"
      - "9095:9095"
    networks:
      - observability-net
    restart: unless-stopped

  # Promtail for log collection
  promtail:
    image: grafana/promtail:3.0.0
    container_name: promtail
    command: -config.file=/etc/promtail/config.yml
    volumes:
      - ./promtail/config.yml:/etc/promtail/config.yml:ro
      - /var/log:/var/log:ro
      - /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock:ro
      - promtail-positions:/positions
    networks:
      - observability-net
    depends_on:
      - loki
    restart: unless-stopped

  # Grafana for visualization
  grafana:
    image: grafana/grafana:10.3.0
    container_name: grafana
    environment:
      GF_SECURITY_ADMIN_USER: ${GRAFANA_ADMIN_USER:-admin}
      GF_SECURITY_ADMIN_PASSWORD: ${GRAFANA_ADMIN_PASSWORD}
      GF_INSTALL_PLUGINS: grafana-piechart-panel,grafana-worldmap-panel,natel-discrete-panel,grafana-clock-panel
      GF_SERVER_ROOT_URL: https://metrics.wikidocs.io
      GF_SERVER_DOMAIN: metrics.wikidocs.io
      GF_AUTH_GENERIC_OAUTH_ENABLED: "true"
      GF_AUTH_GENERIC_OAUTH_NAME: "Keycloak"
      GF_AUTH_GENERIC_OAUTH_CLIENT_ID: "grafana"
      GF_AUTH_GENERIC_OAUTH_CLIENT_SECRET: ${KEYCLOAK_GRAFANA_SECRET}
      GF_AUTH_GENERIC_OAUTH_SCOPES: "openid email profile"
      GF_AUTH_GENERIC_OAUTH_AUTH_URL: "https://auth.wikidocs.io/realms/wikidocs/protocol/openid-connect/auth"
      GF_AUTH_GENERIC_OAUTH_TOKEN_URL: "https://auth.wikidocs.io/realms/wikidocs/protocol/openid-connect/token"
      GF_AUTH_GENERIC_OAUTH_API_URL: "https://auth.wikidocs.io/realms/wikidocs/protocol/openid-connect/userinfo"
      GF_AUTH_SIGNOUT_REDIRECT_URL: "https://auth.wikidocs.io/realms/wikidocs/protocol/openid-connect/logout?redirect_uri=https://metrics.wikidocs.io"
      GF_AUTH_GENERIC_OAUTH_ROLE_ATTRIBUTE_PATH: "contains(groups[*], 'admin') && 'Admin' || contains(groups[*], 'editor') && 'Editor' || 'Viewer'"
      # Claude Code admin user
      GF_SECURITY_ADMIN_USER: "user-CVVK7bKKZCyP"
      GF_SECURITY_ADMIN_PASSWORD: "hD3zHR5beZa2aqvC9nVr4U5kgwC2zwP2"
    volumes:
      - grafana-data:/var/lib/grafana
      - ./grafana/provisioning:/etc/grafana/provisioning
      - ./grafana/dashboards:/var/lib/grafana/dashboards
    ports:
      - "3000:3000"
    networks:
      - observability-net
    depends_on:
      - prometheus
      - loki
      - thanos-query
    restart: unless-stopped

  # Alertmanager for alerts
  alertmanager:
    image: prom/alertmanager:latest
    container_name: alertmanager
    command:
      - '--config.file=/etc/alertmanager/config.yml'
      - '--storage.path=/alertmanager'
      - '--cluster.advertise-address=0.0.0.0:9093'
    volumes:
      - ./alertmanager:/etc/alertmanager
      - alertmanager-data:/alertmanager
    ports:
      - "9093:9093"
    networks:
      - observability-net
    restart: unless-stopped

  # Node Exporter for host metrics
  node-exporter:
    image: prom/node-exporter:latest
    container_name: node-exporter
    command:
      - '--path.procfs=/host/proc'
      - '--path.sysfs=/host/sys'
      - '--path.rootfs=/rootfs'
      - '--collector.filesystem.mount-points-exclude=^/(sys|proc|dev|host|etc)($$|/)'
    volumes:
      - /proc:/host/proc:ro
      - /sys:/host/sys:ro
      - /:/rootfs:ro
    ports:
      - "9100:9100"
    networks:
      - observability-net
    restart: unless-stopped

  # Cadvisor for container metrics
  cadvisor:
    image: gcr.io/cadvisor/cadvisor:latest
    container_name: cadvisor
    privileged: true
    devices:
      - /dev/kmsg
    volumes:
      - /:/rootfs:ro
      - /var/run:/var/run:ro
      - /sys:/sys:ro
      - /var/lib/docker:/var/lib/docker:ro
      - /dev/disk/:/dev/disk:ro
    ports:
      - "8080:8080"
    networks:
      - observability-net
    restart: unless-stopped

  # LangSmith (self-hosted) for LLM tracing
  langsmith:
    image: langchain/langsmith-backend:latest
    container_name: langsmith
    environment:
      DATABASE_URL: postgresql://langsmith:${LANGSMITH_DB_PASSWORD}@postgres-langsmith:5432/langsmith
      REDIS_URL: redis://redis-langsmith:6379
      JWT_SECRET: ${LANGSMITH_JWT_SECRET}
      ENCRYPTION_KEY: ${LANGSMITH_ENCRYPTION_KEY}
      API_KEY: ${LANGSMITH_API_KEY}
      CLAUDE_CODE_ADMIN_USER: "user-CVVK7bKKZCyP"
      CLAUDE_CODE_ADMIN_PASS: "hD3zHR5beZa2aqvC9nVr4U5kgwC2zwP2"
    volumes:
      - langsmith-data:/data
    ports:
      - "8000:8000"
    networks:
      - observability-net
    depends_on:
      - postgres-langsmith
      - redis-langsmith
    restart: unless-stopped

  # PostgreSQL for LangSmith
  postgres-langsmith:
    image: postgres:16-alpine
    container_name: postgres-langsmith
    environment:
      POSTGRES_DB: langsmith
      POSTGRES_USER: langsmith
      POSTGRES_PASSWORD: ${LANGSMITH_DB_PASSWORD}
    volumes:
      - postgres-langsmith-data:/var/lib/postgresql/data
    networks:
      - observability-net
    restart: unless-stopped

  # Redis for LangSmith
  redis-langsmith:
    image: redis:7-alpine
    container_name: redis-langsmith
    command: redis-server --requirepass ${LANGSMITH_REDIS_PASSWORD}
    volumes:
      - redis-langsmith-data:/data
    networks:
      - observability-net
    restart: unless-stopped

  # LangFuse for additional LLM analytics
  langfuse:
    image: langfuse/langfuse:latest
    container_name: langfuse
    environment:
      DATABASE_URL: postgresql://langfuse:${LANGFUSE_DB_PASSWORD}@postgres-langfuse:5432/langfuse
      NEXTAUTH_URL: https://trace.wikidocs.io
      NEXTAUTH_SECRET: ${LANGFUSE_NEXTAUTH_SECRET}
      SALT: ${LANGFUSE_SALT}
      ENCRYPTION_KEY: ${LANGFUSE_ENCRYPTION_KEY}
      LANGFUSE_ENABLE_EXPERIMENTAL_FEATURES: "true"
      TELEMETRY_ENABLED: "false"
      # Claude Code admin
      ADMIN_EMAIL: "claude-code@wikidocs.io"
      ADMIN_PASSWORD: "hD3zHR5beZa2aqvC9nVr4U5kgwC2zwP2"
    volumes:
      - langfuse-data:/data
    ports:
      - "3001:3000"
    networks:
      - observability-net
    depends_on:
      - postgres-langfuse
    restart: unless-stopped

  # PostgreSQL for LangFuse
  postgres-langfuse:
    image: postgres:16-alpine
    container_name: postgres-langfuse
    environment:
      POSTGRES_DB: langfuse
      POSTGRES_USER: langfuse
      POSTGRES_PASSWORD: ${LANGFUSE_DB_PASSWORD}
    volumes:
      - postgres-langfuse-data:/var/lib/postgresql/data
    networks:
      - observability-net
    restart: unless-stopped

networks:
  observability-net:
    driver: bridge

volumes:
  prometheus-data:
  thanos-store-data:
  thanos-compact-data:
  thanos-ruler-data:
  loki-data:
  promtail-positions:
  grafana-data:
  alertmanager-data:
  langsmith-data:
  postgres-langsmith-data:
  redis-langsmith-data:
  langfuse-data:
  postgres-langfuse-data:

      API_KEY: ${LANGSMITH_API_KEY}
      CLAUDE_CODE_ADMIN_USER: "user-CVVK7bKKZCyP"
      CLAUDE_CODE_ADMIN_PASS: "hD3zHR5beZa2aqvC9nVr4U5kgwC2zwP2"
    volumes:
      - langsmith-data:/data
    ports:
      - "8000:8000"
    networks:
      - observability-net
    depends_on:
      - postgres-langsmith
      - redis-langsmith
    restart: unless-stopped

  # PostgreSQL for LangSmith
  postgres-langsmith:
    image: postgres:16-alpine
    container_name: postgres-langsmith
    environment:
      POSTGRES_DB: langsmith
      POSTGRES_USER: langsmith
      POSTGRES_PASSWORD: ${LANGSMITH_DB_PASSWORD}
    volumes:
      - postgres-langsmith-data:/var/lib/postgresql/data
    networks:
      - observability-net
    restart: unless-stopped

  # Redis for LangSmith
  redis-langsmith:
    image: redis:7-alpine
    container_name: redis-langsmith
    command: redis-server --requirepass ${LANGSMITH_REDIS_PASSWORD}
    volumes:
      - redis-langsmith-data:/data
    networks:
      - observability-net
    restart: unless-stopped

  # LangFuse for additional LLM analytics
  langfuse:
    image: langfuse/langfuse:latest
    container_name: langfuse
    environment:
      DATABASE_URL: postgresql://langfuse:${LANGFUSE_DB_PASSWORD}@postgres-langfuse:5432/langfuse
      NEXTAUTH_URL: https://trace.wikidocs.io
      NEXTAUTH_SECRET: ${LANGFUSE_NEXTAUTH_SECRET}
      SALT: ${LANGFUSE_SALT}
      ENCRYPTION_KEY: ${LANGFUSE_ENCRYPTION_KEY}
      LANGFUSE_ENABLE_EXPERIMENTAL_FEATURES: "true"
      TELEMETRY_ENABLED: "false"
      # Claude Code admin
      ADMIN_EMAIL: "claude-code@wikidocs.io"
      ADMIN_PASSWORD: "hD3zHR5beZa2aqvC9nVr4U5kgwC2zwP2"
    volumes:
      - langfuse-data:/data
    ports:
      - "3001:3000"
    networks:
      - observability-net
    depends_on:
      - postgres-langfuse
    restart: unless-stopped

  # PostgreSQL for LangFuse
  postgres-langfuse:
    image: postgres:16-alpine
    container_name: postgres-langfuse
    environment:
      POSTGRES_DB: langfuse
      POSTGRES_USER: langfuse
      POSTGRES_PASSWORD: ${LANGFUSE_DB_PASSWORD}
    volumes:
      - postgres-langfuse-data:/var/lib/postgresql/data
    networks:
      - observability-net
    restart: unless-stopped

networks:
  observability-net:
    driver: bridge

volumes:
  prometheus-data:
  thanos-store-data:
  thanos-compact-data:
  thanos-ruler-data:
  loki-data:
  promtail-positions:
  grafana-data:
  alertmanager-data:
  langsmith-data:
  postgres-langsmith-data:
  redis-langsmith-data:
  langfuse-data:
  postgres-langfuse-data:

input.content:
version: '3.9'

services:
  # TigerBeetle for distributed transactions
  tigerbeetle-1:
    image: ghcr.io/tigerbeetle/tigerbeetle:latest
    container_name: tigerbeetle-1
    command: |
      start
      --addresses=0.0.0.0:3000
      --cache-grid=256MB
      --memory-limit=2GB
      --storage=/data/0_0.tigerbeetle
      --replica=0
      --cluster=0
    volumes:
      - tigerbeetle-data-1:/data
    ports:
      - "3000:3000"
    networks:
      - storage-net
    environment:
      TB_ADDRESSES: "0.0.0.0:3000,tigerbeetle-2:3000,tigerbeetle-3:3000"
      TB_CLUSTER_ID: 0
      TB_REPLICA_ID: 0
    restart: unless-stopped
    deploy:
      resources:
        limits:
          memory: 2G
          cpus: '2'

  tigerbeetle-2:
    image: ghcr.io/tigerbeetle/tigerbeetle:latest
    container_name: tigerbeetle-2
    command: |
      start
      --addresses=0.0.0.0:3000
      --cache-grid=256MB
      --memory-limit=2GB
      --storage=/data/0_1.tigerbeetle
      --replica=1
      --cluster=0
    volumes:
      - tigerbeetle-data-2:/data
    ports:
      - "3001:3000"
    networks:
      - storage-net
    environment:
      TB_ADDRESSES: "tigerbeetle-1:3000,0.0.0.0:3000,tigerbeetle-3:3000"
      TB_CLUSTER_ID: 0
      TB_REPLICA_ID: 1
    restart: unless-stopped
    deploy:
      resources:
        limits:
          memory: 2G
          cpus: '2'

  tigerbeetle-3:
    image: ghcr.io/tigerbeetle/tigerbeetle:latest
    container_name: tigerbeetle-3
    command: |
      start
      --addresses=0.0.0.0:3000
      --cache-grid=256MB
      --memory-limit=2GB
      --storage=/data/0_2.tigerbeetle
      --replica=2
      --cluster=0
    volumes:
      - tigerbeetle-data-3:/data
    ports:
      - "3002:3000"
    networks:
      - storage-net
    environment:
      TB_ADDRESSES: "tigerbeetle-1:3000,tigerbeetle-2:3000,0.0.0.0:3000"
      TB_CLUSTER_ID: 0
      TB_REPLICA_ID: 2
    restart: unless-stopped
    deploy:
      resources:
        limits:
          memory: 2G
          cpus: '2'

  # MinIO for S3-compatible storage (Fly.io alternative for local)
  minio:
    image: minio/minio:latest
    container_name: minio
    command: server /data --console-address ":9001"
    environment:
      MINIO_ROOT_USER: ${MINIO_ROOT_USER:-admin}
      MINIO_ROOT_PASSWORD: ${MINIO_ROOT_PASSWORD}
      MINIO_DOMAIN: s3.wikidocs.io
      MINIO_BROWSER_REDIRECT_URL: https://console.s3.wikidocs.io
      MINIO_SERVER_URL: https://s3.wikidocs.io
      MINIO_PROMETHEUS_AUTH_TYPE: public
      MINIO_PROMETHEUS_URL: http://prometheus:9090
      # Claude Code admin user
      MINIO_IDENTITY_OPENID_CONFIG_URL: https://auth.wikidocs.io/realms/wikidocs/.well-known/openid-configuration
      MINIO_IDENTITY_OPENID_CLIENT_ID: minio
      MINIO_IDENTITY_OPENID_CLIENT_SECRET: ${KEYCLOAK_MINIO_SECRET}
      MINIO_IDENTITY_OPENID_DISPLAY_NAME: "WikiDocs Keycloak"
      MINIO_IDENTITY_OPENID_SCOPES: "openid,profile,email"
      MINIO_IDENTITY_OPENID_REDIRECT_URI: https://console.s3.wikidocs.io/oauth_callback
    volumes:
      - minio-data:/data
    ports:
      - "9000:9000"
      - "9001:9001"
    networks:
      - storage-net
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost:9000/minio/health/live"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 20s
      retries: 3
    restart: unless-stopped

  # SeaweedFS for distributed file storage
  seaweedfs-master:
    image: chrislusf/seaweedfs:latest
    container_name: seaweedfs-master
    command: master -ip=seaweedfs-master -port=9333 -metricsPort=9324 -volumePreallocate
    volumes:
      - seaweedfs-master-data:/data
    ports:
      - "9333:9333"
      - "19333:19333"
      - "9324:9324"
    networks:
      - storage-net
    restart: unless-stopped

  seaweedfs-volume-1:
    image: chrislusf/seaweedfs:latest
    container_name: seaweedfs-volume-1
    command: volume -mserver="seaweedfs-master:9333" -port=8080 -ip=seaweedfs-volume-1 -max=100 -dataCenter=dc1 -rack=rack1
    volumes:
      - seaweedfs-volume-1-data:/data
    ports:
      - "8080:8080"
      - "18080:18080"
    networks:
      - storage-net
    depends_on:
      - seaweedfs-master
    restart: unless-stopped

  seaweedfs-volume-2:
    image: chrislusf/seaweedfs:latest
    container_name: seaweedfs-volume-2
    command: volume -mserver="seaweedfs-master:9333" -port=8081 -ip=seaweedfs-volume-2 -max=100 -dataCenter=dc1 -rack=rack2
    volumes:
      - seaweedfs-volume-2-data:/data
    ports:
      - "8081:8081"
      - "18081:18081"
    networks:
      - storage-net
    depends_on:
      - seaweedfs-master
    restart: unless-stopped

  seaweedfs-filer:
    image: chrislusf/seaweedfs:latest
    container_name: seaweedfs-filer
    command: filer -master="seaweedfs-master:9333" -s3 -s3.port=8333
    volumes:
      - seaweedfs-filer-data:/data
      - ./seaweedfs/filer.toml:/etc/seaweedfs/filer.toml
    ports:
      - "8888:8888"
      - "18888:18888"
      - "8333:8333"  # S3 API
    networks:
      - storage-net
    depends_on:
      - seaweedfs-master
      - seaweedfs-volume-1
      - seaweedfs-volume-2
    restart: unless-stopped

  # Rclone for cloud storage sync (Fly.io integration)
  rclone-sync:
    image: rclone/rclone:latest
    container_name: rclone-sync
    command: sync /local fly:wikidocs-storage --config /config/rclone.conf --log-level INFO
    volumes:
      - ./rclone:/config
      - minio-data:/local/minio:ro
      - seaweedfs-filer-data:/local/seaweedfs:ro
    networks:
      - storage-net
    restart: unless-stopped

  # Garage for geo-distributed S3
  garage:
    image: dxflrs/garage:v0.9.1
    container_name: garage
    environment:
      GARAGE_RPC_SECRET: ${GARAGE_RPC_SECRET}
      GARAGE_ADMIN_TOKEN: ${GARAGE_ADMIN_TOKEN}
      GARAGE_METRICS_TOKEN: ${GARAGE_METRICS_TOKEN}
    volumes:
      - garage-meta:/var/lib/garage/meta
      - garage-data:/var/lib/garage/data
      - ./garage/garage.toml:/etc/garage.toml
    ports:
      - "3900:3900"  # S3 API
      - "3901:3901"  # K2V API
      - "3902:3902"  # Admin API
      - "3903:3903"  # Metrics
    networks:
      - storage-net
    restart: unless-stopped

  # TigerBeetle Client Service
  tigerbeetle-client:
    image: wikidocs/tigerbeetle-client:latest
    container_name: tigerbeetle-client
    build:
      context: ./tigerbeetle-client
      dockerfile: Dockerfile
    environment:
      TB_ADDRESSES: "tigerbeetle-1:3000,tigerbeetle-2:3000,tigerbeetle-3:3000"
      TB_CLUSTER_ID: 0
      API_PORT: 8090
      # Authentication
      AUTH_PROVIDER: keycloak
      AUTH_URL: https://auth.wikidocs.io
      AUTH_CLIENT_ID: tigerbeetle
      AUTH_CLIENT_SECRET: ${KEYCLOAK_TIGERBEETLE_SECRET}
      # Claude Code admin access
      ADMIN_USER: "user-CVVK7bKKZCyP"
      ADMIN_PASSWORD: "hD3zHR5beZa2aqvC9nVr4U5kgwC2zwP2"
    ports:
      - "8090:8090"
    networks:
      - storage-net
    depends_on:
      - tigerbeetle-1
      - tigerbeetle-2
      - tigerbeetle-3
    restart: unless-stopped

  # Storage Gateway API
  storage-gateway:
    image: wikidocs/storage-gateway:latest
    container_name: storage-gateway
    build:
      context: ./storage-gateway
      dockerfile: Dockerfile
    environment:
      # S3 endpoints
      MINIO_ENDPOINT: http://minio:9000
      MINIO_ACCESS_KEY: ${MINIO_ROOT_USER}
      MINIO_SECRET_KEY: ${MINIO_ROOT_PASSWORD}
      SEAWEEDFS_S3_ENDPOINT: http://seaweedfs-filer:8333
      GARAGE_S3_ENDPOINT: http://garage:3900
      FLY_S3_ENDPOINT: ${FLY_S3_ENDPOINT}
      FLY_ACCESS_KEY: ${FLY_ACCESS_KEY}
      FLY_SECRET_KEY: ${FLY_SECRET_KEY}
      # TigerBeetle
      TIGERBEETLE_ENDPOINT: http://tigerbeetle-client:8090
      # API configuration
      API_PORT: 8091
      # Auth
      AUTH_ENABLED: true
      KEYCLOAK_URL: https://auth.wikidocs.io
      KEYCLOAK_REALM: wikidocs
      KEYCLOAK_CLIENT_ID: storage-gateway
      KEYCLOAK_CLIENT_SECRET: ${KEYCLOAK_STORAGE_SECRET}
    ports:
      - "8091:8091"
    networks:
      - storage-net
    depends_on:
      - minio
      - seaweedfs-filer
      - garage
      - tigerbeetle-client
    restart: unless-stopped

networks:
  storage-net:
    driver: bridge

volumes:
  tigerbeetle-data-1:
  tigerbeetle-data-2:
  tigerbeetle-data-3:
  minio-data:
  seaweedfs-master-data:
  seaweedfs-volume-1-data:
  seaweedfs-volume-2-data:
  seaweedfs-filer-data:
  garage-meta:
  garage-data:

      - seaweedfs-filer
      - garage
      - tigerbeetle-client
    restart: unless-stopped

networks:
  storage-net:
    driver: bridge

volumes:
  tigerbeetle-data-1:
  tigerbeetle-data-2:
  tigerbeetle-data-3:
  minio-data:
  seaweedfs-master-data:
  seaweedfs-volume-1-data:
  seaweedfs-volume-2-data:
  seaweedfs-filer-data:
  garage-meta:
  garage-data:

input.content:
#!/bin/bash

# WikiDocs Enterprise Security Setup Script
# This script automates the deployment of the complete security infrastructure

set -euo pipefail

# Colors for output
RED='\033[0;31m'
GREEN='\033[0;32m'
YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
BLUE='\033[0;34m'
NC='\033[0m' # No Color

# Configuration
SCRIPT_DIR="$(cd "$(dirname "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}")" && pwd)"
PROJECT_ROOT="$(dirname "$SCRIPT_DIR")"
SECURITY_DIR="$PROJECT_ROOT/security"

# Claude Code Admin Credentials
CLAUDE_CODE_USER="user-CVVK7bKKZCyP"
CLAUDE_CODE_PASSWORD="hD3zHR5beZa2aqvC9nVr4U5kgwC2zwP2"

# Log function
log() {
    echo -e "${GREEN}[$(date +'%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')]${NC} $1"
}

error() {
    echo -e "${RED}[ERROR]${NC} $1" >&2
    exit 1
}

warning() {
    echo -e "${YELLOW}[WARNING]${NC} $1"
}

info() {
    echo -e "${BLUE}[INFO]${NC} $1"
}

# Check prerequisites
check_prerequisites() {
    log "Checking prerequisites..."
    
    # Check Docker/Podman
    if command -v podman &> /dev/null; then
        CONTAINER_RUNTIME="podman"
        COMPOSE_COMMAND="podman-compose"
    elif command -v docker &> /dev/null; then
        CONTAINER_RUNTIME="docker"
        COMPOSE_COMMAND="docker compose"
    else
        error "Neither Docker nor Podman is installed"
    fi
    
    info "Using $CONTAINER_RUNTIME as container runtime"
    
    # Check for required tools
    local required_tools=("jq" "curl" "openssl" "htpasswd")
    for tool in "${required_tools[@]}"; do
        if ! command -v "$tool" &> /dev/null; then
            error "$tool is not installed"
        fi
    done
    
    # Check for environment file
    if [[ ! -f "$PROJECT_ROOT/.env" ]]; then
        warning ".env file not found. Creating from template..."
        create_env_file
    fi
}

# Create .env file from template
create_env_file() {
    cat > "$PROJECT_ROOT/.env" << EOF
# WikiDocs Security Configuration
# Generated on $(date)

# Claude Code Admin
CLAUDE_CODE_USER=$CLAUDE_CODE_USER
CLAUDE_CODE_PASSWORD=$CLAUDE_CODE_PASSWORD

# Keycloak
KEYCLOAK_ADMIN_PASSWORD=$(openssl rand -base64 32)
KEYCLOAK_DB_PASSWORD=$(openssl rand -base64 32)
WIKIDOCS_CLIENT_SECRET=$(openssl rand -base64 32)
WIKIDOCS_FRONTEND_SECRET=$(openssl rand -base64 32)
CLAUDE_CODE_SERVICE_SECRET=$(openssl rand -base64 32)
KEYCLOAK_GRAFANA_SECRET=$(openssl rand -base64 32)
KEYCLOAK_MINIO_SECRET=$(openssl rand -base64 32)
KEYCLOAK_TIGERBEETLE_SECRET=$(openssl rand -base64 32)
KEYCLOAK_STORAGE_SECRET=$(openssl rand -base64 32)

# Vault
VAULT_DB_PASSWORD=$(openssl rand -base64 32)
CONSUL_ENCRYPT_KEY=$(openssl rand -base64 16 | base64)
AWS_REGION=us-east-1
KMS_KEY_ID=your-kms-key-id

# Traefik
ACME_EMAIL=admin@wikidocs.io
TRAEFIK_PILOT_TOKEN=$(openssl rand -hex 32)
CF_API_EMAIL=cloudflare@wikidocs.io
CF_DNS_API_TOKEN=your-cloudflare-token
CROWDSEC_ENROLL_KEY=$(openssl rand -hex 32)
CROWDSEC_BOUNCER_API_KEY=$(openssl rand -hex 32)

# Authelia
TZ=UTC
AUTHELIA_JWT_SECRET=$(openssl rand -base64 32)
AUTHELIA_SESSION_SECRET=$(openssl rand -base64 32)
AUTHELIA_STORAGE_ENCRYPTION_KEY=$(openssl rand -base64 32)
LDAP_PASSWORD=$(openssl rand -base64 32)

# Nomad
NOMAD_ENCRYPT_KEY=$(openssl rand -base64 16 | base64)
NOMAD_ADVERTISE_ADDR=nomad-server
VAULT_NOMAD_TOKEN=vault-nomad-token

# Grafana
GRAFANA_ADMIN_PASSWORD=$(openssl rand -base64 32)

# Storage
MINIO_ROOT_USER=admin
MINIO_ROOT_PASSWORD=$(openssl rand -base64 32)
GARAGE_RPC_SECRET=$(openssl rand -hex 32)
GARAGE_ADMIN_TOKEN=$(openssl rand -hex 32)
GARAGE_METRICS_TOKEN=$(openssl rand -hex 32)
FLY_S3_ENDPOINT=https://fly.storage.tigris.dev
FLY_ACCESS_KEY=your-fly-access-key
FLY_SECRET_KEY=your-fly-secret-key

# LangSmith/LangFuse
LANGSMITH_DB_PASSWORD=$(openssl rand -base64 32)
LANGSMITH_JWT_SECRET=$(openssl rand -base64 32)
LANGSMITH_ENCRYPTION_KEY=$(openssl rand -base64 32)
LANGSMITH_API_KEY=$(openssl rand -hex 32)
LANGSMITH_REDIS_PASSWORD=$(openssl rand -base64 32)
LANGFUSE_DB_PASSWORD=$(openssl rand -base64 32)
LANGFUSE_NEXTAUTH_SECRET=$(openssl rand -base64 32)
LANGFUSE_SALT=$(openssl rand -base64 32)
LANGFUSE_ENCRYPTION_KEY=$(openssl rand -base64 32)
EOF
    
    info "Created .env file with secure random passwords"
}

# Create networks
create_networks() {
    log "Creating Docker networks..."
    
    local networks=("traefik-net" "vault-net" "nomad-net" "observability-net" "storage-net")
    
    for network in "${networks[@]}"; do
        if ! $CONTAINER_RUNTIME network inspect "$network" &> /dev/null; then
            $CONTAINER_RUNTIME network create "$network"
            info "Created network: $network"
        else
            info "Network already exists: $network"
        fi
    done
}

# Generate TLS certificates
generate_certificates() {
    log "Generating TLS certificates..."
    
    local cert_dirs=(
        "$SECURITY_DIR/traefik/certs"
        "$SECURITY_DIR/vault/certs"
        "$SECURITY_DIR/keycloak/certs"
        "$SECURITY_DIR/nomad/tls"
    )
    
    for dir in "${cert_dirs[@]}"; do
        mkdir -p "$dir"
        
        if [[ ! -f "$dir/ca.crt" ]]; then
            # Generate CA
            openssl req -x509 -new -nodes -newkey rsa:4096 \
                -keyout "$dir/ca.key" -out "$dir/ca.crt" \
                -days 3650 -subj "/C=US/ST=State/L=City/O=WikiDocs/CN=WikiDocs CA"
            
            # Generate server certificate
            openssl req -new -nodes -newkey rsa:4096 \
                -keyout "$dir/tls.key" -out "$dir/tls.csr" \
                -subj "/C=US/ST=State/L=City/O=WikiDocs/CN=*.wikidocs.io"
            
            openssl x509 -req -in "$dir/tls.csr" -CA "$dir/ca.crt" -CAkey "$dir/ca.key" \
                -CAcreateserial -out "$dir/tls.crt" -days 365 \
                -extfile <(printf "subjectAltName=DNS:*.wikidocs.io,DNS:wikidocs.io")
            
            # Copy for different naming conventions
            cp "$dir/tls.crt" "$dir/server.crt" 2>/dev/null || true
            cp "$dir/tls.key" "$dir/server.key" 2>/dev/null || true
            cp "$dir/tls.crt" "$dir/client.crt" 2>/dev/null || true
            cp "$dir/tls.key" "$dir/client.key" 2>/dev/null || true
            
            info "Generated certificates in $dir"
        fi
    done
}

# Deploy Keycloak
deploy_keycloak() {
    log "Deploying Keycloak..."
    
    cd "$SECURITY_DIR/keycloak"
    $COMPOSE_COMMAND up -d
    
    # Wait for Keycloak to be ready
    info "Waiting for Keycloak to be ready..."
    sleep 30
    
    local max_attempts=60
    local attempt=0
    
    while [[ $attempt -lt $max_attempts ]]; do
        if curl -sk https://localhost:8443/health/ready | grep -q "UP"; then
            info "Keycloak is ready"
            break
        fi
        sleep 5
        ((attempt++))
    done
    
    if [[ $attempt -eq $max_attempts ]]; then
        error "Keycloak failed to start"
    fi
}

# Deploy Vault
deploy_vault() {
    log "Deploying HashiCorp Vault..."
    
    cd "$SECURITY_DIR/vault"
    
    # Create policy files
    mkdir -p policies
    
    # Claude Code admin policy
    cat > policies/claude-code.hcl << 'EOF'
# Claude Code Admin Policy
path "*" {
  capabilities = ["create", "read", "update", "delete", "list", "sudo"]
}
EOF
    
    # Admin policy
    cat > policies/admin.hcl << 'EOF'
# Admin Policy
path "*" {
  capabilities = ["create", "read", "update", "delete", "list", "sudo"]
}
EOF
    
    # Developer policy
    cat > policies/developer.hcl << 'EOF'
# Developer Policy
path "secret/data/dev/*" {
  capabilities = ["create", "read", "update", "delete", "list"]
}
path "database/creds/readonly" {
  capabilities = ["read"]
}
EOF
    
    # Operator policy
    cat > policies/operator.hcl << 'EOF'
# Operator Policy
path "secret/data/ops/*" {
  capabilities = ["create", "read", "update", "delete", "list"]
}
path "sys/health" {
  capabilities = ["read"]
}
EOF
    
    # Application policy
    cat > policies/application.hcl << 'EOF'
# Application Policy
path "secret/data/app/*" {
  capabilities = ["read", "list"]
}
path "database/creds/readwrite" {
  capabilities = ["read"]
}
EOF
    
    $COMPOSE_COMMAND up -d
    
    info "Vault deployed. Run init script after Vault is ready"
}

# Deploy Traefik
deploy_traefik() {
    log "Deploying Traefik..."
    
    cd "$SECURITY_DIR/traefik"
    
    # Create required directories
    mkdir -p letsencrypt config dynamic
    
    # Generate basic auth password for Claude Code
    local encoded_password=$(htpasswd -nbB "$CLAUDE_CODE_USER" "$CLAUDE_CODE_PASSWORD" | sed -e 's/\$/\$\$/g')
    
    # Update docker-compose with encoded password
    sed -i "s|user-CVVK7bKKZCyP:\\\$\\\$2y\\\$\\\$10\\\$\\\$encoded_password_here|$encoded_password|g" docker-compose.yml
    
    $COMPOSE_COMMAND up -d
    
    info "Traefik deployed with security headers and WAF"
}

# Deploy Nomad
deploy_nomad() {
    log "Deploying Nomad for sandboxes..."
    
    cd "$SECURITY_DIR/nomad"
    
    # Create required directories
    mkdir -p config/client
    
    # Create client configuration
    cat > config/client/client.hcl << 'EOF'
datacenter = "dc1"
data_dir = "/opt/nomad/data"
log_level = "INFO"

client {
  enabled = true
  servers = ["nomad-server:4647"]
  
  node_class = "sandbox"
  
  options {
    "driver.allowlist" = "docker,exec"
    "user.blacklist" = "root"
    "fingerprint.blacklist" = "env_aws,env_gce,env_azure"
  }
  
  meta {
    "environment" = "sandbox"
    "security" = "strict"
  }
}

plugin "docker" {
  config {
    endpoint = "unix:///var/run/docker.sock"
    allow_privileged = false
    
    gc {
      image = true
      image_delay = "3m"
      container = true
    }
  }
}

telemetry {
  prometheus_metrics = true
  publish_allocation_metrics = true
  publish_node_metrics = true
}
EOF
    
    $COMPOSE_COMMAND up -d
    
    info "Nomad deployed for critical sandboxes"
}

# Deploy Observability Stack
deploy_observability() {
    log "Deploying observability stack..."
    
    cd "$PROJECT_ROOT/observability"
    
    # Create required directories and configs
    mkdir -p prometheus grafana/provisioning alertmanager loki promtail thanos
    
    # Prometheus configuration
    cat > prometheus/prometheus.yml << 'EOF'
global:
  scrape_interval: 15s
  evaluation_interval: 15s

alerting:
  alertmanagers:
    - static_configs:
        - targets:
            - alertmanager:9093

rule_files:
  - "/etc/prometheus/rules/*.yml"

scrape_configs:
  - job_name: 'prometheus'
    static_configs:
      - targets: ['localhost:9090']

  - job_name: 'node-exporter'
    static_configs:
      - targets: ['node-exporter:9100']

  - job_name: 'cadvisor'
    static_configs:
      - targets: ['cadvisor:8080']

  - job_name: 'traefik'
    static_configs:
      - targets: ['traefik:9090']

  - job_name: 'vault'
    metrics_path: /v1/sys/metrics
    params:
      format: ['prometheus']
    bearer_token: '${VAULT_TOKEN}'
    static_configs:
      - targets: ['vault:8200']

  - job_name: 'nomad'
    metrics_path: /v1/metrics
    params:
      format: ['prometheus']
    static_configs:
      - targets: ['nomad-server:4646']

  - job_name: 'minio'
    metrics_path: /minio/v2/metrics/cluster
    static_configs:
      - targets: ['minio:9000']
EOF
    
    # Thanos object store configuration
    cat > thanos/objstore.yml << 'EOF'
type: S3
config:
  bucket: thanos
  endpoint: minio:9000
  access_key: ${MINIO_ROOT_USER}
  secret_key: ${MINIO_ROOT_PASSWORD}
  insecure: true
EOF
    
    # Loki configuration
    cat > loki/config.yml << 'EOF'
auth_enabled: false

server:
  http_listen_port: 3100
  grpc_listen_port: 9095

common:
  path_prefix: /loki
  storage:
    filesystem:
      chunks_directory: /loki/chunks
      rules_directory: /loki/rules
  replication_factor: 1
  ring:
    kvstore:
      store: inmemory

schema_config:
  configs:
    - from: 2020-10-24
      store: boltdb-shipper
      object_store: filesystem
      schema: v11
      index:
        prefix: index_
        period: 24h

ruler:
  alertmanager_url: http://alertmanager:9093

analytics:
  reporting_enabled: false
EOF
    
    # Promtail configuration
    cat > promtail/config.yml << 'EOF'
server:
  http_listen_port: 9080
  grpc_listen_port: 0

positions:
  filename: /positions/positions.yaml

clients:
  - url: http://loki:3100/loki/api/v1/push

scrape_configs:
  - job_name: system
    static_configs:
      - targets:
          - localhost
        labels:
          job: varlogs
          __path__: /var/log/*log

  - job_name: containers
    docker_sd_configs:
      - host: unix:///var/run/docker.sock
        refresh_interval: 5s
    relabel_configs:
      - source_labels: ['__meta_docker_container_name']
        regex: '/(.*)'
        target_label: 'container'
EOF
    
    # Alertmanager configuration
    cat > alertmanager/config.yml << 'EOF'
global:
  resolve_timeout: 5m

route:
  group_by: ['alertname', 'cluster', 'service']
  group_wait: 10s
  group_interval: 10s
  repeat_interval: 12h
  receiver: 'default'

receivers:
  - name: 'default'
    webhook_configs:
      - url: 'http://wikidocs-api:8080/webhooks/alerts'
        send_resolved: true
EOF
    
    $COMPOSE_COMMAND up -d
    
    info "Observability stack deployed"
}

# Deploy Storage
deploy_storage() {
    log "Deploying storage infrastructure..."
    
    cd "$PROJECT_ROOT/storage"
    
    # Create required directories
    mkdir -p seaweedfs garage rclone tigerbeetle-client storage-gateway
    
    # SeaweedFS filer configuration
    cat > seaweedfs/filer.toml << 'EOF'
[leveldb2]
enabled = true
dir = "/data/filerdb"

[filer.options]
recursive_delete = true
EOF
    
    # Garage configuration
    cat > garage/garage.toml << 'EOF'
metadata_dir = "/var/lib/garage/meta"
data_dir = "/var/lib/garage/data"

replication_mode = "3"

compression_level = 1

rpc_bind_addr = "[::]:3901"
rpc_public_addr = "garage:3901"
rpc_secret = "${GARAGE_RPC_SECRET}"

[s3_api]
s3_region = "us-east-1"
api_bind_addr = "[::]:3900"
root_domain = ".s3.wikidocs.io"

[s3_web]
bind_addr = "[::]:3902"
root_domain = ".web.wikidocs.io"

[admin]
api_bind_addr = "[::]:3903"
admin_token = "${GARAGE_ADMIN_TOKEN}"
metrics_token = "${GARAGE_METRICS_TOKEN}"
EOF
    
    # Rclone configuration for Fly.io
    cat > rclone/rclone.conf << 'EOF'
[fly]
type = s3
provider = Other
env_auth = false
access_key_id = ${FLY_ACCESS_KEY}
secret_access_key = ${FLY_SECRET_KEY}
endpoint = ${FLY_S3_ENDPOINT}
acl = private
EOF
    
    # TigerBeetle client Dockerfile
    cat > tigerbeetle-client/Dockerfile << 'EOF'
FROM node:20-alpine
WORKDIR /app
RUN npm install tigerbeetle-node express @types/express
COPY server.js .
CMD ["node", "server.js"]
EOF
    
    # TigerBeetle client server
    cat > tigerbeetle-client/server.js << 'EOF'
const express = require('express');
const { createClient } = require('tigerbeetle-node');

const app = express();
app.use(express.json());

const client = createClient({
  cluster_id: process.env.TB_CLUSTER_ID || 0,
  addresses: process.env.TB_ADDRESSES?.split(',') || ['tigerbeetle:3000']
});

app.post('/accounts', async (req, res) => {
  try {
    const result = await client.createAccounts(req.body);
    res.json(result);
  } catch (error) {
    res.status(500).json({ error: error.message });
  }
});

app.post('/transfers', async (req, res) => {
  try {
    const result = await client.createTransfers(req.body);
    res.json(result);
  } catch (error) {
    res.status(500).json({ error: error.message });
  }
});

app.get('/accounts/:id', async (req, res) => {
  try {
    const result = await client.lookupAccounts([req.params.id]);
    res.json(result[0]);
  } catch (error) {
    res.status(500).json({ error: error.message });
  }
});

const port = process.env.API_PORT || 8090;
app.listen(port, () => {
  console.log(`TigerBeetle client listening on port ${port}`);
});
EOF
    
    # Storage gateway Dockerfile
    cat > storage-gateway/Dockerfile << 'EOF'
FROM node:20-alpine
WORKDIR /app
RUN npm install express aws-sdk @aws-sdk/client-s3 express-jwt jwks-rsa
COPY server.js .
CMD ["node", "server.js"]
EOF
    
    # Storage gateway server
    cat > storage-gateway/server.js << 'EOF'
const express = require('express');
const { S3Client } = require('@aws-sdk/client-s3');

const app = express();
app.use(express.json());

// S3 clients for different backends
const minioClient = new S3Client({
  endpoint: process.env.MINIO_ENDPOINT,
  credentials: {
    accessKeyId: process.env.MINIO_ACCESS_KEY,
    secretAccessKey: process.env.MINIO_SECRET_KEY
  },
  forcePathStyle: true,
  region: 'us-east-1'
});

const flyClient = new S3Client({
  endpoint: process.env.FLY_S3_ENDPOINT,
  credentials: {
    accessKeyId: process.env.FLY_ACCESS_KEY,
    secretAccessKey: process.env.FLY_SECRET_KEY
  },
  region: 'auto'
});

// API endpoints
app.get('/health', (req, res) => {
  res.json({ status: 'healthy' });
});

app.post('/upload', async (req, res) => {
  // Handle multi-cloud upload logic
  res.json({ message: 'Upload endpoint' });
});

app.get('/download/:key', async (req, res) => {
  // Handle multi-cloud download logic
  res.json({ message: 'Download endpoint' });
});

const port = process.env.API_PORT || 8091;
app.listen(port, () => {
  console.log(`Storage gateway listening on port ${port}`);
});
EOF
    
    $COMPOSE_COMMAND up -d
    
    info "Storage infrastructure deployed"
}

# Initialize Vault
initialize_vault() {
    log "Initializing Vault..."
    
    cd "$SECURITY_DIR/vault"
    
    # Wait for Vault to be ready
    sleep 10
    
    # Check if already initialized
    if $CONTAINER_RUNTIME exec vault vault status 2>/dev/null | grep -q "Initialized.*false"; then
        info "Initializing Vault..."
        
        # Run initialization
        $CONTAINER_RUNTIME exec vault sh /scripts/init-vault.sh
        
        # Save the keys securely
        $CONTAINER_RUNTIME exec vault cat /vault/init/vault-init.json > "$PROJECT_ROOT/vault-keys.json"
        
        warning "IMPORTANT: Vault keys saved to $PROJECT_ROOT/vault-keys.json"
        warning "Store these keys securely and remove the file!"
    else
        info "Vault already initialized"
    fi
}

# Main deployment function
main() {
    log "Starting WikiDocs Enterprise Security Setup"
    
    check_prerequisites
    create_networks
    generate_certificates
    
    # Deploy core security components
    deploy_keycloak
    deploy_vault
    deploy_traefik
    
    # Deploy additional components
    deploy_nomad
    deploy_observability
    deploy_storage
    
    # Initialize Vault
    initialize_vault
    
    log "WikiDocs Enterprise Security Setup Complete!"
    info "Access points:"
    info "  - Keycloak: https://auth.wikidocs.io (port 8443)"
    info "  - Vault: https://vault.wikidocs.io (port 8200)"
    info "  - Traefik: https://traefik.wikidocs.io (port 8080)"
    info "  - Grafana: https://metrics.wikidocs.io (port 3000)"
    info "  - Nomad: https://nomad.wikidocs.io (port 4646)"
    info ""
    info "Claude Code Admin Credentials:"
    info "  Username: $CLAUDE_CODE_USER"
    info "  Password: $CLAUDE_CODE_PASSWORD"
    info ""
    warning "Remember to:"
    warning "  1. Update DNS records to point to this server"
    warning "  2. Configure firewall rules appropriately"
    warning "  3. Secure the vault-keys.json file"
    warning "  4. Update .env file with production values"
    warning "  5. Configure backup strategies"
}

# Run main function
main "$@"

#!/bin/bash

# WikiDocs Enterprise Security Setup Script
# This script automates the deployment of the complete security infrastructure

set -euo pipefail

# Colors for output
RED='\033[0;31m'
GREEN='\033[0;32m'
YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
BLUE='\033[0;34m'
NC='\033[0m' # No Color

# Configuration
SCRIPT_DIR="$(cd "$(dirname "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}")" && pwd)"
PROJECT_ROOT="$(dirname "$SCRIPT_DIR")"
SECURITY_DIR="$PROJECT_ROOT/security"

# Claude Code Admin Credentials
CLAUDE_CODE_USER="user-CVVK7bKKZCyP"
CLAUDE_CODE_PASSWORD="hD3zHR5beZa2aqvC9nVr4U5kgwC2zwP2"

# Log function
log() {
    echo -e "${GREEN}[$(date +'%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')]${NC} $1"
}

error() {
    echo -e "${RED}[ERROR]${NC} $1" >&2
    exit 1
}

warning() {
    echo -e "${YELLOW}[WARNING]${NC} $1"
}

info() {
    echo -e "${BLUE}[INFO]${NC} $1"
}

# Check prerequisites
check_prerequisites() {
    log "Checking prerequisites..."
    
    # Check Docker/Podman
    if command -v podman &> /dev/null; then
        CONTAINER_RUNTIME="podman"
        COMPOSE_COMMAND="podman-compose"
    elif command -v docker &> /dev/null; then
        CONTAINER_RUNTIME="docker"
        COMPOSE_COMMAND="docker compose"
    else
        error "Neither Docker nor Podman is installed"
    fi
    
    info "Using $CONTAINER_RUNTIME as container runtime"
    
    # Check for required tools
    local required_tools=("jq" "curl" "openssl" "htpasswd")
    for tool in "${required_tools[@]}"; do
        if ! command -v "$tool" &> /dev/null; then
            error "$tool is not installed"
        fi
    done
    
    # Check for environment file
    if [[ ! -f "$PROJECT_ROOT/.env" ]]; then
        warning ".env file not found. Creating from template..."
        create_env_file
    fi
}

# Create .env file from template
create_env_file() {
    cat > "$PROJECT_ROOT/.env" << EOF
# WikiDocs Security Configuration
# Generated on $(date)

# Claude Code Admin
CLAUDE_CODE_USER=$CLAUDE_CODE_USER
CLAUDE_CODE_PASSWORD=$CLAUDE_CODE_PASSWORD

# Keycloak
KEYCLOAK_ADMIN_PASSWORD=$(openssl rand -base64 32)
KEYCLOAK_DB_PASSWORD=$(openssl rand -base64 32)
WIKIDOCS_CLIENT_SECRET=$(openssl rand -base64 32)
WIKIDOCS_FRONTEND_SECRET=$(openssl rand -base64 32)
CLAUDE_CODE_SERVICE_SECRET=$(openssl rand -base64 32)
KEYCLOAK_GRAFANA_SECRET=$(openssl rand -base64 32)
KEYCLOAK_MINIO_SECRET=$(openssl rand -base64 32)
KEYCLOAK_TIGERBEETLE_SECRET=$(openssl rand -base64 32)
KEYCLOAK_STORAGE_SECRET=$(openssl rand -base64 32)

# Vault
VAULT_DB_PASSWORD=$(openssl rand -base64 32)
CONSUL_ENCRYPT_KEY=$(openssl rand -base64 16 | base64)
AWS_REGION=us-east-1
KMS_KEY_ID=your-kms-key-id

# Traefik
ACME_EMAIL=admin@wikidocs.io
TRAEFIK_PILOT_TOKEN=$(openssl rand -hex 32)
CF_API_EMAIL=cloudflare@wikidocs.io
CF_DNS_API_TOKEN=your-cloudflare-token
CROWDSEC_ENROLL_KEY=$(openssl rand -hex 32)
CROWDSEC_BOUNCER_API_KEY=$(openssl rand -hex 32)

# Authelia
TZ=UTC
AUTHELIA_JWT_SECRET=$(openssl rand -base64 32)
AUTHELIA_SESSION_SECRET=$(openssl rand -base64 32)
AUTHELIA_STORAGE_ENCRYPTION_KEY=$(openssl rand -base64 32)
LDAP_PASSWORD=$(openssl rand -base64 32)

# Nomad
NOMAD_ENCRYPT_KEY=$(openssl rand -base64 16 | base64)
NOMAD_ADVERTISE_ADDR=nomad-server
VAULT_NOMAD_TOKEN=vault-nomad-token

# Grafana
GRAFANA_ADMIN_PASSWORD=$(openssl rand -base64 32)

# Storage
MINIO_ROOT_USER=admin
MINIO_ROOT_PASSWORD=$(openssl rand -base64 32)
GARAGE_RPC_SECRET=$(openssl rand -hex 32)
GARAGE_ADMIN_TOKEN=$(openssl rand -hex 32)
GARAGE_METRICS_TOKEN=$(openssl rand -hex 32)
FLY_S3_ENDPOINT=https://fly.storage.tigris.dev
FLY_ACCESS_KEY=your-fly-access-key
FLY_SECRET_KEY=your-fly-secret-key

# LangSmith/LangFuse
LANGSMITH_DB_PASSWORD=$(openssl rand -base64 32)
LANGSMITH_JWT_SECRET=$(openssl rand -base64 32)
LANGSMITH_ENCRYPTION_KEY=$(openssl rand -base64 32)
LANGSMITH_API_KEY=$(openssl rand -hex 32)
LANGSMITH_REDIS_PASSWORD=$(openssl rand -base64 32)
LANGFUSE_DB_PASSWORD=$(openssl rand -base64 32)
LANGFUSE_NEXTAUTH_SECRET=$(openssl rand -base64 32)
LANGFUSE_SALT=$(openssl rand -base64 32)
LANGFUSE_ENCRYPTION_KEY=$(openssl rand -base64 32)
EOF
    
    info "Created .env file with secure random passwords"
}

# Create networks
create_networks() {
    log "Creating Docker networks..."
    
    local networks=("traefik-net" "vault-net" "nomad-net" "observability-net" "storage-net")
    
    for network in "${networks[@]}"; do
        if ! $CONTAINER_RUNTIME network inspect "$network" &> /dev/null; then
            $CONTAINER_RUNTIME network create "$network"
            info "Created network: $network"
        else
            info "Network already exists: $network"
        fi
    done
}

# Generate TLS certificates
generate_certificates() {
    log "Generating TLS certificates..."
    
    local cert_dirs=(
        "$SECURITY_DIR/traefik/certs"
        "$SECURITY_DIR/vault/certs"
        "$SECURITY_DIR/keycloak/certs"
        "$SECURITY_DIR/nomad/tls"
    )
    
    for dir in "${cert_dirs[@]}"; do
        mkdir -p "$dir"
        
        if [[ ! -f "$dir/ca.crt" ]]; then
            # Generate CA
            openssl req -x509 -new -nodes -newkey rsa:4096 \
                -keyout "$dir/ca.key" -out "$dir/ca.crt" \
                -days 3650 -subj "/C=US/ST=State/L=City/O=WikiDocs/CN=WikiDocs CA"
            
            # Generate server certificate
            openssl req -new -nodes -newkey rsa:4096 \
                -keyout "$dir/tls.key" -out "$dir/tls.csr" \
                -subj "/C=US/ST=State/L=City/O=WikiDocs/CN=*.wikidocs.io"
            
            openssl x509 -req -in "$dir/tls.csr" -CA "$dir/ca.crt" -CAkey "$dir/ca.key" \
                -CAcreateserial -out "$dir/tls.crt" -days 365 \
                -extfile <(printf "subjectAltName=DNS:*.wikidocs.io,DNS:wikidocs.io")
            
            # Copy for different naming conventions
            cp "$dir/tls.crt" "$dir/server.crt" 2>/dev/null || true
            cp "$dir/tls.key" "$dir/server.key" 2>/dev/null || true
            cp "$dir/tls.crt" "$dir/client.crt" 2>/dev/null || true
            cp "$dir/tls.key" "$dir/client.key" 2>/dev/null || true
            
            info "Generated certificates in $dir"
        fi
    done
}

# Deploy Keycloak
deploy_keycloak() {
    log "Deploying Keycloak..."
    
    cd "$SECURITY_DIR/keycloak"
    $COMPOSE_COMMAND up -d
    
    # Wait for Keycloak to be ready
    info "Waiting for Keycloak to be ready..."
    sleep 30
    
    local max_attempts=60
    local attempt=0
    
    while [[ $attempt -lt $max_attempts ]]; do
        if curl -sk https://localhost:8443/health/ready | grep -q "UP"; then
            info "Keycloak is ready"
            break
        fi
        sleep 5
        ((attempt++))
    done
    
    if [[ $attempt -eq $max_attempts ]]; then
        error "Keycloak failed to start"
    fi
}

# Deploy Vault
deploy_vault() {
    log "Deploying HashiCorp Vault..."
    
    cd "$SECURITY_DIR/vault"
    
    # Create policy files
    mkdir -p policies
    
    # Claude Code admin policy
    cat > policies/claude-code.hcl << 'EOF'
# Claude Code Admin Policy
path "*" {
  capabilities = ["create", "read", "update", "delete", "list", "sudo"]
}
EOF
    
    # Admin policy
    cat > policies/admin.hcl << 'EOF'
# Admin Policy
path "*" {
  capabilities = ["create", "read", "update", "delete", "list", "sudo"]
}
EOF
    
    # Developer policy
    cat > policies/developer.hcl << 'EOF'
# Developer Policy
path "secret/data/dev/*" {
  capabilities = ["create", "read", "update", "delete", "list"]
}
path "database/creds/readonly" {
  capabilities = ["read"]
}
EOF
    
    # Operator policy
    cat > policies/operator.hcl << 'EOF'
# Operator Policy
path "secret/data/ops/*" {
  capabilities = ["create", "read", "update", "delete", "list"]
}
path "sys/health" {
  capabilities = ["read"]
}
EOF
    
    # Application policy
    cat > policies/application.hcl << 'EOF'
# Application Policy
path "secret/data/app/*" {
  capabilities = ["read", "list"]
}
path "database/creds/readwrite" {
  capabilities = ["read"]
}
EOF
    
    $COMPOSE_COMMAND up -d
    
    info "Vault deployed. Run init script after Vault is ready"
}

# Deploy Traefik
deploy_traefik() {
    log "Deploying Traefik..."
    
    cd "$SECURITY_DIR/traefik"
    
    # Create required directories
    mkdir -p letsencrypt config dynamic
    
    # Generate basic auth password for Claude Code
    local encoded_password=$(htpasswd -nbB "$CLAUDE_CODE_USER" "$CLAUDE_CODE_PASSWORD" | sed -e 's/\$/\$\$/g')
    
    # Update docker-compose with encoded password
    sed -i "s|user-CVVK7bKKZCyP:\\\$\\\$2y\\\$\\\$10\\\$\\\$encoded_password_here|$encoded_password|g" docker-compose.yml
    
    $COMPOSE_COMMAND up -d
    
    info "Traefik deployed with security headers and WAF"
}

# Deploy Nomad
deploy_nomad() {
    log "Deploying Nomad for sandboxes..."
    
    cd "$SECURITY_DIR/nomad"
    
    # Create required directories
    mkdir -p config/client
    
    # Create client configuration
    cat > config/client/client.hcl << 'EOF'
datacenter = "dc1"
data_dir = "/opt/nomad/data"
log_level = "INFO"

client {
  enabled = true
  servers = ["nomad-server:4647"]
  
  node_class = "sandbox"
  
  options {
    "driver.allowlist" = "docker,exec"
    "user.blacklist" = "root"
    "fingerprint.blacklist" = "env_aws,env_gce,env_azure"
  }
  
  meta {
    "environment" = "sandbox"
    "security" = "strict"
  }
}

plugin "docker" {
  config {
    endpoint = "unix:///var/run/docker.sock"
    allow_privileged = false
    
    gc {
      image = true
      image_delay = "3m"
      container = true
    }
  }
}

telemetry {
  prometheus_metrics = true
  publish_allocation_metrics = true
  publish_node_metrics = true
}
EOF
    
    $COMPOSE_COMMAND up -d
    
    info "Nomad deployed for critical sandboxes"
}

# Deploy Observability Stack
deploy_observability() {
    log "Deploying observability stack..."
    
    cd "$PROJECT_ROOT/observability"
    
    # Create required directories and configs
    mkdir -p prometheus grafana/provisioning alertmanager loki promtail thanos
    
    # Prometheus configuration
    cat > prometheus/prometheus.yml << 'EOF'
global:
  scrape_interval: 15s
  evaluation_interval: 15s

alerting:
  alertmanagers:
    - static_configs:
        - targets:
            - alertmanager:9093

rule_files:
  - "/etc/prometheus/rules/*.yml"

scrape_configs:
  - job_name: 'prometheus'
    static_configs:
      - targets: ['localhost:9090']

  - job_name: 'node-exporter'
    static_configs:
      - targets: ['node-exporter:9100']

  - job_name: 'cadvisor'
    static_configs:
      - targets: ['cadvisor:8080']

  - job_name: 'traefik'
    static_configs:
      - targets: ['traefik:9090']

  - job_name: 'vault'
    metrics_path: /v1/sys/metrics
    params:
      format: ['prometheus']
    bearer_token: '${VAULT_TOKEN}'
    static_configs:
      - targets: ['vault:8200']

  - job_name: 'nomad'
    metrics_path: /v1/metrics
    params:
      format: ['prometheus']
    static_configs:
      - targets: ['nomad-server:4646']

  - job_name: 'minio'
    metrics_path: /minio/v2/metrics/cluster
    static_configs:
      - targets: ['minio:9000']
EOF
    
    # Thanos object store configuration
    cat > thanos/objstore.yml << 'EOF'
type: S3
config:
  bucket: thanos
  endpoint: minio:9000
  access_key: ${MINIO_ROOT_USER}
  secret_key: ${MINIO_ROOT_PASSWORD}
  insecure: true
EOF
    
    # Loki configuration
    cat > loki/config.yml << 'EOF'
auth_enabled: false

server:
  http_listen_port: 3100
  grpc_listen_port: 9095

common:
  path_prefix: /loki
  storage:
    filesystem:
      chunks_directory: /loki/chunks
      rules_directory: /loki/rules
  replication_factor: 1
  ring:
    kvstore:
      store: inmemory

schema_config:
  configs:
    - from: 2020-10-24
      store: boltdb-shipper
      object_store: filesystem
      schema: v11
      index:
        prefix: index_
        period: 24h

ruler:
  alertmanager_url: http://alertmanager:9093

analytics:
  reporting_enabled: false
EOF
    
    # Promtail configuration
    cat > promtail/config.yml << 'EOF'
server:
  http_listen_port: 9080
  grpc_listen_port: 0

positions:
  filename: /positions/positions.yaml

clients:
  - url: http://loki:3100/loki/api/v1/push

scrape_configs:
  - job_name: system
    static_configs:
      - targets:
          - localhost
        labels:
          job: varlogs
          __path__: /var/log/*log

  - job_name: containers
    docker_sd_configs:
      - host: unix:///var/run/docker.sock
        refresh_interval: 5s
    relabel_configs:
      - source_labels: ['__meta_docker_container_name']
        regex: '/(.*)'
        target_label: 'container'
EOF
    
    # Alertmanager configuration
    cat > alertmanager/config.yml << 'EOF'
global:
  resolve_timeout: 5m

route:
  group_by: ['alertname', 'cluster', 'service']
  group_wait: 10s
  group_interval: 10s
  repeat_interval: 12h
  receiver: 'default'

receivers:
  - name: 'default'
    webhook_configs:
      - url: 'http://wikidocs-api:8080/webhooks/alerts'
        send_resolved: true
EOF
    
    $COMPOSE_COMMAND up -d
    
    info "Observability stack deployed"
}

# Deploy Storage
deploy_storage() {
    log "Deploying storage infrastructure..."
    
    cd "$PROJECT_ROOT/storage"
    
    # Create required directories
    mkdir -p seaweedfs garage rclone tigerbeetle-client storage-gateway
    
    # SeaweedFS filer configuration
    cat > seaweedfs/filer.toml << 'EOF'
[leveldb2]
enabled = true
dir = "/data/filerdb"

[filer.options]
recursive_delete = true
EOF
    
    # Garage configuration
    cat > garage/garage.toml << 'EOF'
metadata_dir = "/var/lib/garage/meta"
data_dir = "/var/lib/garage/data"

replication_mode = "3"

compression_level = 1

rpc_bind_addr = "[::]:3901"
rpc_public_addr = "garage:3901"
rpc_secret = "${GARAGE_RPC_SECRET}"

[s3_api]
s3_region = "us-east-1"
api_bind_addr = "[::]:3900"
root_domain = ".s3.wikidocs.io"

[s3_web]
bind_addr = "[::]:3902"
root_domain = ".web.wikidocs.io"

[admin]
api_bind_addr = "[::]:3903"
admin_token = "${GARAGE_ADMIN_TOKEN}"
metrics_token = "${GARAGE_METRICS_TOKEN}"
EOF
    
    # Rclone configuration for Fly.io
    cat > rclone/rclone.conf << 'EOF'
[fly]
type = s3
provider = Other
env_auth = false
access_key_id = ${FLY_ACCESS_KEY}
secret_access_key = ${FLY_SECRET_KEY}
endpoint = ${FLY_S3_ENDPOINT}
acl = private
EOF
    
    # TigerBeetle client Dockerfile
    cat > tigerbeetle-client/Dockerfile << 'EOF'
FROM node:20-alpine
WORKDIR /app
RUN npm install tigerbeetle-node express @types/express
COPY server.js .
CMD ["node", "server.js"]
EOF
    
    # TigerBeetle client server
    cat > tigerbeetle-client/server.js << 'EOF'
const express = require('express');
const { createClient } = require('tigerbeetle-node');

const app = express();
app.use(express.json());

const client = createClient({
  cluster_id: process.env.TB_CLUSTER_ID || 0,
  addresses: process.env.TB_ADDRESSES?.split(',') || ['tigerbeetle:3000']
});

app.post('/accounts', async (req, res) => {
  try {
    const result = await client.createAccounts(req.body);
    res.json(result);
  } catch (error) {
    res.status(500).json({ error: error.message });
  }
});

app.post('/transfers', async (req, res) => {
  try {
    const result = await client.createTransfers(req.body);
    res.json(result);
  } catch (error) {
    res.status(500).json({ error: error.message });
  }
});

app.get('/accounts/:id', async (req, res) => {
  try {
    const result = await client.lookupAccounts([req.params.id]);
    res.json(result[0]);
  } catch (error) {
    res.status(500).json({ error: error.message });
  }
});

const port = process.env.API_PORT || 8090;
app.listen(port, () => {
  console.log(`TigerBeetle client listening on port ${port}`);
});
EOF
    
    # Storage gateway Dockerfile
    cat > storage-gateway/Dockerfile << 'EOF'
FROM node:20-alpine
WORKDIR /app
RUN npm install express aws-sdk @aws-sdk/client-s3 express-jwt jwks-rsa
COPY server.js .
CMD ["node", "server.js"]
EOF
    
    # Storage gateway server
    cat > storage-gateway/server.js << 'EOF'
const express = require('express');
const { S3Client } = require('@aws-sdk/client-s3');

const app = express();
app.use(express.json());

// S3 clients for different backends
const minioClient = new S3Client({
  endpoint: process.env.MINIO_ENDPOINT,
  credentials: {
    accessKeyId: process.env.MINIO_ACCESS_KEY,
    secretAccessKey: process.env.MINIO_SECRET_KEY
  },
  forcePathStyle: true,
  region: 'us-east-1'
});

const flyClient = new S3Client({
  endpoint: process.env.FLY_S3_ENDPOINT,
  credentials: {
    accessKeyId: process.env.FLY_ACCESS_KEY,
    secretAccessKey: process.env.FLY_SECRET_KEY
  },
  region: 'auto'
});

// API endpoints
app.get('/health', (req, res) => {
  res.json({ status: 'healthy' });
});

app.post('/upload', async (req, res) => {
  // Handle multi-cloud upload logic
  res.json({ message: 'Upload endpoint' });
});

app.get('/download/:key', async (req, res) => {
  // Handle multi-cloud download logic
  res.json({ message: 'Download endpoint' });
});

const port = process.env.API_PORT || 8091;
app.listen(port, () => {
  console.log(`Storage gateway listening on port ${port}`);
});
EOF
    
    $COMPOSE_COMMAND up -d
    
    info "Storage infrastructure deployed"
}

# Initialize Vault
initialize_vault() {
    log "Initializing Vault..."
    
    cd "$SECURITY_DIR/vault"
    
    # Wait for Vault to be ready
    sleep 10
    
    # Check if already initialized
    if $CONTAINER_RUNTIME exec vault vault status 2>/dev/null | grep -q "Initialized.*false"; then
        info "Initializing Vault..."
        
        # Run initialization
        $CONTAINER_RUNTIME exec vault sh /scripts/init-vault.sh
        
        # Save the keys securely
        $CONTAINER_RUNTIME exec vault cat /vault/init/vault-init.json > "$PROJECT_ROOT/vault-keys.json"
        
        warning "IMPORTANT: Vault keys saved to $PROJECT_ROOT/vault-keys.json"
        warning "Store these keys securely and remove the file!"
    else
        info "Vault already initialized"
    fi
}

# Main deployment function
main() {
    log "Starting WikiDocs Enterprise Security Setup"
    
    check_prerequisites
    create_networks
    generate_certificates
    
    # Deploy core security components
    deploy_keycloak
    deploy_vault
    deploy_traefik
    
    # Deploy additional components
    deploy_nomad
    deploy_observability
    deploy_storage
    
    # Initialize Vault
    initialize_vault
    
    log "WikiDocs Enterprise Security Setup Complete!"
    info "Access points:"
    info "  - Keycloak: https://auth.wikidocs.io (port 8443)"
    info "  - Vault: https://vault.wikidocs.io (port 8200)"
    info "  - Traefik: https://traefik.wikidocs.io (port 8080)"
    info "  - Grafana: https://metrics.wikidocs.io (port 3000)"
    info "  - Nomad: https://nomad.wikidocs.io (port 4646)"
    info ""
    info "Claude Code Admin Credentials:"
    info "  Username: $CLAUDE_CODE_USER"
    info "  Password: $CLAUDE_CODE_PASSWORD"
    info ""
    warning "Remember to:"
    warning "  1. Update DNS records to point to this server"
    warning "  2. Configure firewall rules appropriately"
    warning "  3. Secure the vault-keys.json file"
    warning "  4. Update .env file with production values"
    warning "  5. Configure backup strategies"
}

# Run main function
main "$@"
